title: Game Lobby Crashing
body:
Every so often my lobby crashes, leaving me no choice but to exit, relog and be prompted with an error message say a server problem has occurred.


_Microsoft Windows 10 Home
System Type	x64-based PC
Processor	AMD FX-6300 Six-Core Processor, 3500 Mhz, 3 Core, 6 Logical Processor
BaseBoard Manufacturer	MSI
Installed Physical Memory (RAM)	8.00 GB_

replies.body: Thanks for the detailed info!  It sounds like you might actually be having a network problem staying connected to our servers, which can cause you to desync in champion select or kicked off entirely.  As a first step, go through the instructions in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to strengthen your connection and fix this up.  Let me know if you have any issues afterwards!
Think I resolved the issue, thanks!
